item.title: Russian General Is Shot in Moscow
item.description: The attack bore the hallmark of several assassination attempts on top military officers in the Russian capital.

item.title: U.S. and Iran Set for Talks in Oman
item.description: Middle Eastern diplomats see a chance for progress on Iran’s nuclear program, but they are pessimistic about other U.S. demands.

item.title: Iran Is at Work on Missile and Nuclear Sites, Satellite Images Show
item.description: Repairs at key missile sites began soon after they were hit by Israeli and U.S. strikes last year, but work at Iran’s nuclear facilities has been slow...

item.title: Norway Rallies Behind Royals, Despite Dismay Over Epstein Links
item.description: The future queen’s links to Jeffrey Epstein, and her son’s rape trial, have disappointed many Norwegians. But there is still widespread support for th...

item.title: What to Expect at the Olympic Opening Ceremonies, From the Man Behind Them
item.description: Marco Balich has helped design grand spectacles at more than half a dozen Olympics. On Friday, he’ll do it again, on home turf in Italy.
